channel.title: CVE Feed for Dogtag PKI -- pki-core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dogtag PKI -- pki-core

item.title: CVE-2017-7537|2024-08-05T16:04:11.958Z -- dogtag%20pki -- pki-core
item.description: It was found that a mock CMC authentication plugin with a hardcoded secret was accidentally enabled by default in the pki-core package before 10.6.4. An attacker could potentially use this flaw to bypass the regular authentication process and trick the CA server into issuing certificates.
